Title: MMHT2014 PDFs - HERA I+II data and other updates
Abstract: We will cover a number of topics: some clarifications on MMHT PDFs with varying quark masses; a review of the fit to final HERA data, with consequences for MMHT PDFs, and a study of the fit quality; a brief introduction to topics just starting investigation, mainly the inclusion of new LHC data sets.
